class.name: BulletServerRelay
class.brief_description: Singleton for automatic communication between [BulletServer] and [BulletSpawner] nodes.
class.description: Singleton for automatic communication between [BulletServer] and [BulletSpawner] nodes. Consists simply of signals which a [BulletServer] can connect to for receiving bullet spawn requests, and methods a [BulletSpawner] can connect to for reporting them.

method.name: spawn_bullet
method.description: Emits [code]bullet_spawn_requested[/code] with the given parameters. Connect custom singular bullet spawn request signals here.

method.name: spawn_volley
method.description: Emits [code]volley_spawn_requested[/code] with the given parameters. Connect custom bullet volley spawn request signals here.

signal.name: bullet_spawn_requested
signal.description: Emits when the relay has received a bullet spawn request signal. Connect this to custom singular bullet spawning implementations.

signal.name: volley_spawn_requested
signal.description: Emits when the relay has received a bullet spawn request signal. Connect this to custom bullet volley spawning implementations.
